booking: To make a booking at Barbeque Nation, please provide your name, date, time, and number of guests.
cancellation: To cancel your reservation, please provide your booking ID or name and date.
menu: Our menu includes both vegetarian and non-vegetarian BBQs like kebabs, biryanis, tikkas, and desserts.
general: We are open from 11 AM to 11 PM. You can contact our support at 1800-123-4567.
